item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Hi, I’m Gabriel Knab! I’m passionate about programming, Unity game development, microcontrollers, and 3D printing. Ever since I can remember, Iâ€™ve been fascinated by creating things. And software is incredible because it lets you build anything imaginable.

What I Do

I’m always exploring new technologies and experimenting with ideas, whether it’s a hobby project or learning something entirely new. I love diving into challenges and figuring out how things work, from game mechanics to microcontroller setups.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.
